name: Cowboys Fi DZAIR
description:
Cowboys fi Dzair is a local multiplayer game (2 players - 1 console)

Inspired by the wild west and the old competitive multiplayer games that we used to have fun around.

Cast :

the game has 4 fun Characters inspired by friends of mine.

The first one is NASSAH, The Engineer.

Second is AZMAH, The Hot Headed.

Third is IKAZ, The All Knowing.

and last is EOLAH, The VIP.

This Game was developed for fun but support is much needed and highly appreciated.

HOW TO PLAY :

Simple, first to shoot, first to win.

Credits :

Fully Made by : Dalim.ink

(Code, Art and music)
